name: udigram
description: My Udacity Udagram Full Stack Application Project

scripts.api:build: cd udagram-api && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.api:test: cd udagram-api && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.fe:build: cd udagram-frontend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.fe:test: cd udagram-frontend && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.postinstall: npm run api:install && npm run fe:install

author: Yahya Bakr
